card.note: I love how family means more to you than anything else in the world (except maybe sports)!!
card.author: Mom

card.note: I think you're really awesomeâ€¦ even with all that hair.
card.author: Mom

card.note: Chaser-I love your huge heart and the special moments we get to share together.
card.author: Daddy

card.note: I love your desire to be the best at everything you do./RYour smile can light up a room and your laugh is contagious!!!!! I love you so much.
card.author: Daddy

card.note: I love it when you help others and most importantly your puffy, wet kisses!!!!!!
card.author: Daddy

card.note: You are an AMAZING little boy and I am proud to be your father.
card.author: Daddy

card.note: I love Chase's extreme curiosity for everything!!!
card.author: Pop Pop Kemm

card.note: Recently Chase and I spent some time alone shopping for me. We entered the store and of course Chase started asking questions. Our conversation lasted the entire time we were together! I loved the feeling of closeness we shared that day!
card.author: Love Mom Mom Kemm

card.note: I love the sparkle in his eyes when he knows I actually understand the stats he is reciting!
card.author: Love Mom Mom Kemm

card.note: I Love Chase because he is my grandson and makes me very proud./RI also enjoying talking sports with Chase, he is a walking encyclopedia, he should have been named ESPN. LOL
card.author: Grandpa

card.note: You've brought happiness to everyone from the moment you came into our lives. I love you more than you know xo
card.author: Zanne

card.note: Chase - I love your passion for sports and your knowledge of so many different things - always keep that going - you are such a special boy and I love you so much!!
card.author: Auntie Lisa

card.note: Chase, my precious Grandson./RI am so proud of you. Included in my/RSpecial memories of you are the times we spend together early in the morning./REveryone else is sleeping and we have our special time together. I wish it could be more often. I love you so very much./R
card.author: Grandma Gudel

card.note: You always know how to brighten my mood. Ever since you were little you always knew how to make me smile. I love spending time with you and talking about sports, especially Villanova! You are such a smart, energetic boy and I love you more than you will ever know!!!
card.author: Sarah Domenick

card.note: The things I like most about you is your knowledge of sports and how you always need to win.
card.author: Michael Ippoliti

card.note: chase, it's hard to just say one thing.. you are one of a kind.. A caring boy with a huge heart. You are a star that shines bright. A role model for Presley. You are perfect just the way you are. I'm blessed to have a nephew like you!
card.author: Aunt Lauren

card.note: I like that you like all the same sports I like!
card.author: Danny Johnson

card.note: You are a nice friend, a good athlete and great at playing video games!
card.author: Your buddy TJ

card.note: One thing I like most about Chase is the awesome sports talks we have together. Chase also has a great sense of humor and is just plain fun to be around.
card.author: Mr. Hargest

card.note: Chase is nice and friendly. He was super friend when he was an actor in my cereal box project. He was a great sport to pretend to miss all of the baskets!!
card.author: Luca Webb

card.note: What I like most about Chase is: he is funny, nice, playful, we have fun playing together at recess, and he knows a lot about baseball, football, and basketball.
card.author: Jack Shaw

card.note: I love when you shut everything out around you and just want to snuggle and talk.
card.author: Mommy

card.note: I love your sense of humor. You drop the funniest lines at just the right time, unintentionally, which is what makes you genuinely funny, not someone who is trying to be funny.
card.author: Mommy

card.note: I love when you call me "Momma". It doesn't happen much anymore, but on the occasions it does, it reminds me that you're still my baby boy!
card.author: Mommy (aka Momma)

card.note: Dearest Chase! We love your passion for life!!! Every moment we spend with you is an adventure! Never ever forget how amazing you are! Yes - Bottle that energy and excitement for everything you love!!!
card.author: Love, Auntie Kelly and Uncle Dave

card.note: You are a great athlete and a good friend. I like spending time with you. You are smart too. /R/R
card.author: Landon

card.note: What do I like most about you? Is it how much I enjoy talking about sports with you? Or how great a writer you are and how focused you get when you have a great idea? I could go with digging your cool jersey collection. Think I'll simply go with you being a great kid!
card.author: Mr. Adlin

card.note: Chase is a great friend and King of Pro-Mini Hoop basketball games!
card.author: DJ Peterson

card.note: Chase is so polite, he always remembers to say please and thank you, all of the time!
card.author: Sonia Peterson

card.note: Chase has the best enthusiasm for sports stats. I will be sure to consult him for my next fantasy draft!
card.author: Mark Peterson

card.note: Chase is a great friend who is always there for others people.
card.author: Rowan Hornaday

card.note: I love Chase's hair!
card.author: Robyn Hornaday

card.note: I like that Chase always shakes hands after a game, good or bad.
card.author: Bill Hornaday

card.note: Chase doesn't quit!
card.author: Charlie Henderson

card.note: Hey Chase - you never cease to impress us! We think you are the MVP of Team Kemm (although Mr. Winters thinks you might need a haircut). His offer on getting it buzzed still stands......
card.author: The Winters Family

card.note: What we like most about Chase is his loving spirit and how he always brings a smile to our face.
card.author: Nick & Nickie DePompeo

card.note: The one thing I love most about Chase is his work ethic! Whether it is a toss in the yard or a play off game, you always know Chase is giving 100%! I am so proud of you!
card.author: Becky Porter

card.note: Other than Chase being an awesome kid, he as me, is a great Flyers fan. After hearing about him from Kim I got to see it myself as we started to go down to the Flyers games together. I remember when he was real young we would test him on the players numbers and he knew!
card.author: Murph

card.note: Since the very first day I met you, you've held a huge piece of my heart! You always make me smile and my favorite days are those spent with you! Always reach for the stars! I love you to the moon and back! XOXOXO/R/RLet's Go Flyers, Phillies and Packers!
card.author: Kimmie

card.note: You are a gentleman and a good friend. We are happy to have you as our neighbor!
card.author: The Devlin/Burruano Family

card.note: One thing I like most about Chase is when he uses his time to help Finn with baseball.
card.author: Mr. Nieberle

card.note: Chase, you are like the big brother that I never had!
card.author: love, Finn

card.note: Chase, you are so fun to be around and you make everyone smile :)
card.author: Ryann

card.note: I like it when you play four-square with us. You are a great friend :)
card.author: Jamie

card.note: I love your smile & your great sense of humor! You are always laughing & so much fun to be around!
card.author: xo - momma niebs

card.note: To my son I never had. /RVillanova games, Jay Wright shows, the pool, catches in the yard, I have loved every minute with you. You're the best. I love you!! Stay Good!
card.author: Marky
